com.doyensec.ajp13

Class ForwardRequestMessage

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.doyensec.ajp13.AbstractAjpMessage
      • com.doyensec.ajp13.ForwardRequestMessage
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    AjpMessage

    public class ForwardRequestMessage
extends AbstractAjpMessage
    AJP's ForwardRequestMessage, from the web server to the J2EE container

    This class begins the request-processing cycle from the server to the container

        public ForwardRequestMessage(int method,
                             java.lang.String protocol,
                             java.lang.String requestUri,
                             java.lang.String remoteAddr,
                             java.lang.String remoteHost,
                             java.lang.String serverName,
                             int serverPort,
                             boolean isSsl,
                             java.util.List<Pair<java.lang.String,java.lang.String>> headers,
                             java.util.List<Pair<java.lang.String,java.lang.String>> attributes)
        Complete ForwardRequestMessage constructor
        Parameters:
        method - int The HTTP verb
        protocol - String The HTTP protocol version (HTTP/1.0 or HTTP/1.1)
        requestUri - String The request path (e.g. /logs/)
        remoteAddr - String The client's IP address (e.g. web server's IP)
        remoteHost - String The client's hostname (e.g. web server's hostname)
        serverName - String The server's IP domain name (e.g. container's FQDN)
        serverPort - int The server's TCP port
        isSsl - boolean Does it use SSL?
        headers - The request HTTP headers
        attributes - The request HTTP attributes
